links.to_node: I will continue to feel burdened and frustrated by the responsibility of taking care of the untrained dog.
My living conditions may improve slightly as I provide some care and attention
My older sister may continue to neglect my dog's needs, leading to ongoing frustration and resentment within our family
My mother and younger sister may feel some relief as I help out with the dog, but the overall burden of care may still be unfair to them
The dog may experience some improvement in my quality of life due to my efforts, but the underlying issue of neglect and lack of proper care may persist
